tool_description: Get data from the most famous book collection on the web. Retrieve information about authors, books, categories and more!
name: Goodreads Books
title: Goodreads Books

api_list.name: Get author by user ID
api_list.description:
Returns all data about the author.
Slower than /authors/author-id/{author-id}.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://goodreads-books.p.rapidapi.com/authors/user-id/26367680"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "goodreads-books.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://goodreads-books.p.rapidapi.com/authors/user-id/{user_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "goodreads-books.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get author by author ID
api_list.description:
Returns all data about the author.
Faster than /authors/user-id/{user-id}.
api_list.code:

url = "https://goodreads-books.p.rapidapi.com/authors/author-id/{author_id}"

api_list.name: Get author's books by author ID
api_list.description:
Returns a list of all books written by the author with the provided author ID.
Each page contains 30 results.

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description:
Sort by:
- title
- rating
- popularity
- publication-year
- number-of-pages

api_list.name: Search authors
api_list.description:
Returns a list of all the authors that match the query.
Each page contains 20 results.

api_list.name: Search books
api_list.description:
Returns all books that matches the query (title, author, ISBN, tag,  genre...).
Each page contains 20 results.

optional_parameters.name: isbn
optional_parameters.description:
If it is provided, 'q' and 'page' query parameters will have no effect.
Returns the book that matches that ISBN.

api_list.name: List by id
api_list.description:
Returns all books included on a list (100 books per page)
You can get the id of a list using the endpoint "/lists" to retrieve all available lists, or visiting [goodreads.com/list](https://www.goodreads.com/list) to search for a list and copying it's id from the url.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://goodreads-books.p.rapidapi.com/lists/200"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "goodreads-books.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://goodreads-books.p.rapidapi.com/lists/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "goodreads-books.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Lists
api_list.description: Returns the best lists of books (each page contains 10 lists)

api_list.name: Best books
api_list.description:
Returns a list of the 50 most representative books of a genre
To see the available genres go to [goodreads.com/genres/list](https://www.goodreads.com/genres/list?utf8=%E2%9C%93&filter=top-level).
api_list.code:

        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Book by id
api_list.description: Returns all data about a particular book (author, reviews, genres...)
